TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi sealed beforefieldinit NameScopePropertyAttribute extends System.Attribute
Public NotInheritable Class NameScopePropertyAttribute Inherits Attribute
public ref class NameScopePropertyAttribute sealed : Attribute

summary.span: 指定提供 XAML NameScope 值之相關聯類別的屬性。

span.span: Specifies a property of the associated class that provides the XAML namescope value.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 一般物件模型中的應用程式模型結合使用 XAML 的位置，會做為 XAML 名稱範圍的類別的類別，通常會當做根項目，或支援頁面比喻 /。In a typical object model / application model combination where XAML is used, the classes that are used as a XAML namescope are the classes that are generally used as root elements, or that support a page metaphor. 通常這些類別會實作和 XAML 名稱範圍由對應到根內容架構的程式設計模型與應用程式模型中的一般 XAML 處理行為。These classes generally implement and the XAML namescope is created corresponding to the root by typical XAML processing behavior in context of a framework's programming model and application model. 如果是使用 XAML 名稱範圍的屬性值必須是該物件會實作和保存實際的 XAML 名稱範圍和它的行為。If is used, the XAML namescope property value is expected to be an object that implements and holds the actual XAML namescope and its behavior. 有兩種形式，這個屬性： 僅顯示屬性名稱或型別和屬性。There are two forms for this attribute: property name only, or type and property. 第二個表單應該只用於的情況下，屬性可保存 XAML 名稱範圍的可附加成員。The latter form should be used only for cases where the property that holds the XAML name scope is an attachable member. 附加的成員技術的優點，服務類別可實作的 XAML 名稱範圍概念可支援幾種不同的物件類型。The attached member technique has the advantage that service classes can implement a XAML namescope concept that can support several different object types. 這些物件型別然後不需要明確地與類別繼承。Those object types then do not need to be explicitly related in class inheritance. 在舊版的.NET Framework 中，這個類別會存在於 WindowsBase WPF 專屬組件中。In previous versions of the .NET Framework, this class existed in the WPF-specific assembly WindowsBase. 在[!INCLUDE[net_v40_long](~/includes/net-v40-long-md.md)]，位於 System.Xaml 組件中。In [!INCLUDE[net_v40_long](~/includes/net-v40-long-md.md)], is in the System.Xaml assembly. 如需詳細資訊，請參閱[從 WPF 移轉至 System.Xaml 的類型](~/docs/framework/xaml-services/types-migrated-from-wpf-to-system-xaml.md)。For more information, see [Types Migrated from WPF to System.Xaml](~/docs/framework/xaml-services/types-migrated-from-wpf-to-system-xaml.md). ## WPF 使用注意事項WPF Usage Notes 在 WPF 中，這個屬性會套用至只有單一類型， 。In WPF, this attribute is applied to only a single type, . 屬性化的屬性在此情況下為服務類別及其附加屬性。In this case the attributed property is the service class and its attached property.

summary.span: 初始化 類別的新執行個體。

span.span: Initializes a new instance of the class.

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig specialname rtspecialname instance void .ctor(string name) cil managed

param.name: name
param.span: 提供 XAML NameScope 之屬性化類型上的屬性名稱。

span.span: The name of the property on the attributed type that provides the XAML namescope.

summary.span: 使用指定的名稱，初始化 類別的新執行個體。

span.span: Initializes a new instance of the class with the specified name.

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig specialname rtspecialname instance void .ctor(string name, class System.Type type) cil managed

param.name: name
param.span: 提供 XAML 名稱範圍的可附加成員名稱。

span.span: The name of the attachable member that provides the XAML name scope.

param.name: type
param.span: 提供 XAML 名稱範圍的可附加成員擁有者類型。

span.span: The owner type of the attachable member that provides the XAML name scope.

summary.span: 使用指定的名稱和型別，初始化 類別的新執行個體。

span.span: Initializes a new instance of the class with the specified name and type.

MemberSignature.Value: Public ReadOnly Property Name As String
public: property System::String ^ Name { System::String ^ get(); };

summary.span: 取得提供 XAML 名稱範圍的屬性名稱。

span.span: Gets the name of the property that provides the XAML namescope.

value.span: 字串值，這是提供 XAML 名稱範圍的屬性名稱。

span.span: A string value that is the name of the property that provides the XAML namescope.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 意義取決於是否設定。The meaning of depends on whether is set. 如果為 null，則參考正在屬性化類型上的屬性。If is null, then references a property on the type being attributed. 如果包含值，然後參考之屬性上指定。If contains a value, then references a property on the indicated .

MemberSignature.Value: Public ReadOnly Property Type As Type
public: property Type ^ Type { Type ^ get(); };

summary.span: 取得提供 XAML 名稱範圍支援之附加屬性的擁有者類型。

span.span: Gets the owner type of the attached property that provides the XAML namescope support.

value.span: 值 (這個值是提供 XAML 名稱範圍支援之附加屬性的擁有者型別) 或 。

span.span: A value that is the owner type of the attached property that provides the XAML namescope support, or .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 這個屬性只是相關的 XAML 名稱範圍實作屬性是否為可附加的成員，在這種情況下這是可附加成員的擁有者型別。This property only is relevant if the XAML namescope implementing property is an attachable member, in which case this is the attachable member's owner type. 否則，這個值可能是 null。Otherwise, this value may be null. 如果您需要的報告名稱範圍屬性的型別定義在所有情況下，一般反映型的邏輯，則您可以取代時，您會遇到位置套用屬性的型別`null`這個屬性。If you need general reflection-based logic that reports a namescope property's defining type in all cases, then you can substitute the type where the attribute is applied whenever you encounter `null` for this property.
